name: ETERNAL NIGHT (itch) (blixk)
description:
https://forms.gle/Cpd1xLVCxfHk3cGz9 - Please give feedback on this game!

Created by Oliver Naumov, ETERNAL NIGHT is a Top-down action zombies game. The main objective is to eliminate zombies and survive, if you reach a certain score, there may be final boss battle!
